feature.name: Damage resistance/vulnerability
feature.shortDescription: The skeleton is vulnerable to bludgeoning, but immune to poison. It is also immune to the conditions: exhaustion and poisoned.

feature.name: Undead Nature
feature.shortDescription: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.description: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one-target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.description: +4 to hit, RANGE 80/320 FT, one-target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
